title: Diary of Steve the Noob 11
description: This diary of Steve the Noob contains nearly 9,000 words and 12 pictures to accompany the story. Steve falls into a mini-depression after the arrival of the mysterious stranger. Because of all the hate and criticism from the stranger, our hero was left lost and confused. Find out if Steve recovers from this set back by reading this diary today. This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. author: Steve the Noob
